summary: A depressed woman learns that her husband was killed in a car accident the previous day, then awakens the next morning to find him alive and well at home; then awakens the day after that to find that he's dead.
cast: Sandra Bullock|Julian McMahon|Shyann McClure|Courtney Taylor Burness|Nia Long|Marc Macaulay|Kate Nelligan|Irene Ziegler|Phillip DeVona|Ritchie Montgomery|Matt Moore|Amber Valletta|Peter Stormare|Laurel Whitsett|Kristin Ketterer|Marcus Lyle Brown|Jason Douglas|David A. Shaffer|Floriana Tullio|Mark Famiglietti|E.J. Stapleton|Jude Ciccolella|Dale Beasley|Kip Cummings|Michael J. Hebert|Kimberly Whitfield
keywords: housewife|time travel|time traveler|female time traveler|columbia tristar
title: Premonition (7 días)
